html:
EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT AGREEMENT

DATE/NAME
AGREEMENT made on the ….. day of …… 2022 between M/s {{doc.company}} P.O. Box 1832, Ruwi-112, Sultanate of Oman (hereinafter called the "Company") and MR.{{doc.employee_name or "_____"}}. Nationality {{doc.nationality or "______"}}., Passport …………… hereinafter called the "Employee").

It is agreed between the Company and the Employee as follows:


POSITION
01.
(a)



(b)

The Company agrees to engage the Employee to serve the Company and/or its associates and/or Sub Contractors in the capacity of ………………………………… and the Employee agree to carry out all the jobs entrusted to him within the broad scope of his assignment diligently and to the complete satisfaction of the Company.

The Employee’s services are transferable to any location / department / unit /branch / site work of the Company / subsidiary units or to the Company’s holding company and vice versa, which are in existence or which may be established in future. The Employee will be required to carry out such work as may be assigned to him from time to time including working in shifts.



CONTRACT
PERIOD
02.

The Contract period shall be 24 months which may be renewed with mutual consent after every 24 months.



PROBATION
03.

The Employee shall be on probation for a period of three months from the date of joining. On satisfactory completion of the probationary period, his services shall be confirmed. If his services are not found satisfactory within the probationary period, the Company may terminate his services without any notice to him.



SALARY
04.

The Employee shall be paid a Basic Salary of RO: ……………………/- (Rials Omani …………………………………………. only) per month. All the Salary will be transferred at the end of the month to a designated bank account in Sultanate of Oman or as normally practiced for the employees of the company.



HOUSING ACCOMMODATION AND TRANSPORTATION
05.

The Employee shall be provided with Family Status (wife+2kids) as per Oman Law. The Employee shall be paid a Housing Allowance salary of RO: ………………./-(Rials Omani ……………………. only) per month. The transportation will be to your account.



OTHER ALLOWANCE
06.

The Employee shall be paid an Allowance of RO:……………………/- (Rials Omani …………………………only) per month.



PASSAGE
07.

The Company shall provide free air ticket to the Employee from Mumbai to Muscat for joining duty and return air ticket for leave travel as detailed under Clause 8 hereof.



LEAVE
08.

30 days’ leave with pay shall be granted to the Employee on completion of every one year of continuous service, with return air ticket for sector Muscat– Mumbai -Muscat [Economy Class] for self and family consisting of wife and up to Two children (below 18 years), provided that the children will be studying in Muscat and are fully dependent on employee. No cash reimbursement for air ticket will be done if leave is not availed.



GRATUITY
09.

As per Labour Law of Oman



GSM
10.

As per Company policy.



NOTICE
FOR
RESIGNATION
/TERMINATION
11.

Each party reserves the right to terminate this contract or its renewals at any time, provided that after completion of probation period, the Employee may terminate the employment by giving written notice to the employer not less than three months. On acceptance of resignation, the employer shall decide the last date of the employment depending upon the seniority and job requirements of the employee and the total notice period to be decided by the employer shall be in the range of at least one month and maximum of three months. The Employer may terminate the employment by giving one month’s notice in writing or pay one month’s salary in lieu of notice, except in case of misconduct.



INSURANCE
12.

The Employee is insured under the Workmen’s Compensation Act for disability, disease or death under the statutory rules. In addition, he is also covered under a Group Insurance Policy for natural death.



MEDICAL ATTENTION
13.

Employees are provided with medical facilities, as per company policy.



ILL - HEALTH
14.

Due to ill-health, if the Employee becomes incapable of performing his duties, he will be repatriated by the Company to his home country.



DISPUTE
15.

Any dispute arising out of this agreement shall be submitted to the Department of Labour for settlement, whose decision shall be binding on both parties.



AMENDMENT
16.

The Company reserves the right to amend the terms and conditions of this agreement, as and when deemed necessary, with mutual consent.



MISCONDUCT
17.

In the event the Employee’s services are terminated consequent to any misconduct on his part, such as insubordination, frauds, misappropriation, strikes, refusal to work, violation of the Country's Laws or any other misconduct, the Employee shall not be eligible for any End-of-Service Benefits viz. Leave Salary, Gratuity and Air Ticket etc. Employee is solely responsible for the total cost incurred by company towards employment, if he wish to leave the Company before completing one year continuous service.



EXCLUSIVITY
OF
EMPLOYMENT
18.

The employee is prohibited from trading or carrying out any business or engaging himself directly or indirectly in any other form of employment during the tenure of this agreement.



CUSTODY
OF
PASSPORT
19.

Employee has requested the organization to keep his passport in safe custody during tenure of employment.



In witness whereof, the parties hereto have signed hereunder in token of their acceptance of the terms and conditions described above on the day and year first above written.




For {{doc.company}}



I have read, understood and agree to the terms and conditions mentioned above.



_____________________
Employee Signature
_____________________
Witness
